Text: COOL! have any other BB stuff!? brian wilsons cocaine sessions!?

Ah, the Dennis and Brain "Cocaine" sessions. or as we in the Beach Boy circle call the "Hamburger Sessions".

I have tons of rare recordings by The Beach Boys as well as Brian's productions/guest apperances and I need to share them.

If you  search You Tube for st2580smile you will find my Shindig! Christmas special featuring The Beach Boys from 1964.
The You Tube stuff is amazing. Shindig wow!

An interesting rare track via my CHiSTMAS SMiLES TO YOU podcast of Bruce Johnston (AKA Bob Sled and the Tobaggans) "The Surfer Boys Are Going Sking".:
http://www.switchpod.com/users/st2580/CHRISTMASSMiLESTOYOU2007.mp3

Have fun!
SMiLES!

Hi, I see there hasn't been much buzz about this torrent lately. It seems to have been dormant, but I see someone is seeding! Maybe you st2580smile? Well... in any case if you keep uploading it to me, I will keep it on my hosting forever! I see that it probably won't take much of my bandwidth as I am the only one leeching at the moment. Thanks.
These tracks are mp3 @ 160k/s in case anybody was wondering.
